reviews.review_msg: Lee is super caring and accommodating. However, lectures are unbearably heavy. 130-150 slides per lecture that are sped through pretty quickly. Averages were quite low for the final exam and the project, thankfully grades were curved because of this. I ended up doing well but I wouldn't put myself through that again.

I enjoyed the class and the material, the mock assessment was a different writing assignment than what you normally would do for other classes but it was interesting, it was graded a bit hard, thankfully it was curved. Lectures were heavy, slides range from 130-150 per week it was a bit too much to study. I still recommend and would take him again

Thought I was going to enjoy this class but the material was too dense and he just read off word for word his 150+ slides. This made it hard to study for the final (70% average). Final assessment was terrible, they expected too much from us, graded harshly and didn't provide us with clear instructions (60% average). Thankfully this class was curved
